page.title: 17Life in Little Berkhamsted.2
page.content: In our questionnaire there were some areas where it was felt that improvements could be made. E.g 1.{CHURCH}-could play a greater role in the community. 2.{CLUBS}-limited to cricket club and Women's Institute. 3.{SCHOOL}-the idea of a village school was supported but it was realised there weren't enough children. Questions:1a) Does the local church affect life in the village? 16N, 15Y, 6 Dont Know b) Could the church do more for the community? 12N, 20Y, 5DK c) Is the local church well supported and attended? 25N, 2Y, 10DK 2a) Is there a lot to do in the village? 31N, 5Y, 1DK b) Are there clubs? 20Y,17N
